Posts.Content: On 10/15/2008 SMS1009 wrote: Hi everyone I am new to this board as we just found out my MOM's breat cancer has come back from 7 yrs being cancer free and this time she has to go for chemo. She has her 1st Dr's appt on Friday with medical oncologist and I wanted to ask those who have gone through this what questions she needs to ask to be prepared? Thanks SMS     Make sure your mom has the nutritional suport she will need thru the treatment...I recommend  ( I have melanoma and am a nures)   High dose vitamin C ....   it saved my life
Posts.Title: Mom going for chemo
